member.name: STORAGE_HW_FIRMWARE_DOWNLOAD
member.summary: This structure contains a firmware image payload to be downloaded to the target.

member.name: STORAGE_HW_FIRMWARE_DOWNLOAD.Version
member.summary: The version of this structure. This should be set to sizeof(STORAGE_HW_FIRMWARE_DOWNLOAD).

member.name: STORAGE_HW_FIRMWARE_DOWNLOAD.Size
member.summary: The size of this structure and the download image buffer.

summary.para: Flags associated with this download. The following are valid flags that this member can hold.

listheader.description: Indicates that the target of the request is a controller or adapter, different than the device handler or object itself (e.g. NVMe SSD or HBA).
Indicates that the current firmware image segment is the last one.

member.name: STORAGE_HW_FIRMWARE_DOWNLOAD.Slot
member.summary: The slot number that the firmware image will be downloaded to.

member.name: STORAGE_HW_FIRMWARE_DOWNLOAD.Offset
member.summary: The offset in this buffer of where the Image file begins. This should be aligned to ImagePayloadAlignment from STORAGE_HW_FIRMWARE_INFO.

member.name: STORAGE_HW_FIRMWARE_DOWNLOAD.BufferSize
member.summary: The buffer size of the ImageBuffer. This should be a multiple of ImagePayloadAlignment from STORAGE_HW_FIRMWARE_INFO.
